## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c8fd95a12c33b5408b83318789591e649f3c91eec78d2172ab0752efb45e8c74)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'evoplay-spinential' @ 999.9.12 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
